title: Digital Liberal Arts Teaching Fair VR Demo

media:group.media:title: Digital Liberal Arts Teaching Fair VR Demo
media:group.media:description:
Walkthough of a virtual reality experience developed for the Digital Liberal Arts Teaching Fair at Grinnell College on 08 December 2017. Demo includes insertion point in tutorial room; models developed for the Uncle Sam Plantation project with HASTAC 2017 poster and video, and an interactive art exhibition.

About Me: https://doktorfrag.com
GitHub: https://github.com/doktorfrag/digital-liberal-arts-fair-2017
Immersive Experiences Lab: http://gciel.sites.grinnell.edu
Uncle Sam Plantation Project: http://unclesam.sites.grinnell.edu
